channel.title: !----soonarus----! Devolution source! recruiting!
channel.description:
Hello! Every one that applied i got your name!
Welcome to soonarus, the next Dodian.com
Our home website is Fatalerrors.net which i am working on atm// i didnt not make this name because of Fatalerror source ive had this for 1 yr
What i need 5-10 Good coders,1-5 Advertiser, 1 no-ip hoster, 1 other hamachi hoster 10-15 mods, 2-3 forum mods and 1-5 admins
What I have done ! Nothing at all ! its a plain Devolution v7 source { Ty bakatool true genius }!
Server will be held on a no-ip and 2 Hamachi networks[myne plus another]
If this server gets big enough [Money wise] i will pay you ppl i have around 20 advertisements to get money.
Have a E-mail adress so you can be reached!
If i am offline pm me your application!
Some updates i want this week! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Specs for weps whip,dds,ddp,dd,dlong,dscimmy,gmaul,dbow,dmace, Better magic! Better animations for weps 4 more skills herb farming smithing and rcing More monsters! [ I will do ] Forums and website up [ I will do ] More drops [ I will do ] Make new ppl non premium! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Applications. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- l--------------------------l l Advertisement Application l l--------------------------l 1. Will you post on all Rs-private server Communitys/forums? 2. Post on Hamachi server status page ? 3. Tell all your friends? 4. Help Me/Admins get advertisements so we can make money to keep us alive? 5. Tell all players on Hamachi servers that you join. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- l--------------------------l l Administrator Application l l--------------------------l 1. You will play around 10+ hrs on any of the servers whether it be hamachi or no-ip? which is around 1 1/2 hours a day not much 2. Help coders try to keep all the coders connected ? 3. Help me on anything i ask. 4. Help players and make sure rules are enforced? 5. Handle moderator applications// apllications on anything else? 6. Handle Premium applications? 7. Organize meetings when needed? 8. A lil bit of advertising [=? --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- l--------------------------l l Coding Application l l--------------------------l 1. Be able to be reached in 1-15hrs of contact? 2. Be available on week ends 5-10+hrs plus? The whole weekend not ech day 3. Be on atleast 1-2 hrs a day for any help? 4. Must be a b- to a+ coder? 5. Help your fellow coders? 6. Be able to get a task given to you in the amount of time given? 7. Be in contact of E-mail or any other methods? --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- l--------------------------l l Forum mod Application l l--------------------------l 1. Enforce rules on forums? 2. be on 10+ hrs a week? 3. Be happy [= your job is important? --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- If you want to host the server 1.you must keep 24/7 2. Be reachable so we can send the up to date server file. 3. Dont give the server away! 4. Get your own admins/mods.

item.title: !----soonarus----! Devolution source! recruiting!
item.dc:creator: @0wn3d_f0r_3v3r 0wn3d f0r 3v3r
item.description:
@0wn3d_f0r_3v3r wrote:

  1. You will play around 10+ hrs on any of the servers whether it be hamachi or no-ip? which is around 1 1/2 hours a day not much: yes even though i HATE hamachi…

  2. Help coders try to keep all the coders connected ? yes I will

  3. Help me on anything i ask. yes even coding

  4. Help players and make sure rules are enforced? yes every rule and I will stop all rule breakers!!!

  5. Handle moderator applications// apllications on anything else? yes.

  6. Handle Premium applications? Yes

  7. Organize meetings when needed? yes Iwill

  8. A lil bit of advertising [=?I will etll my friends over the phone at home, over the phone, advertise at school which can get like 400 players… and other ways online!!

well I hope you accept me mate.

Read full topic

item.title: !----soonarus----! Devolution source! recruiting!
item.dc:creator: @Revolutiondodian Revolutiondodian
item.description:
@Revolutiondodian wrote:

Ok im not that great of a coder i can do soem medium stuff “but im giving you oppurtunities” Work on a server with a dedicated server hoster which costs me 189.99.

An oppurtunity to test your abilities!

An a great future side money making skills if this does get big enough like dodian ill pay you guys over 250 ppl or more ppl subscribe for members. they get plenty of money in advertisers do you see my point.

Like i said if your gonna spam please stop.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 23, 2007, 09:45:30 PM[/size][hr]Also thx for the ppl taht signed up [=[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 23, 2007, 09:49:51 PM[/size][hr]grr/

Read full topic

item.title: !----soonarus----! Devolution source! recruiting!
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

I might be willing to help. But for 15 hours plus? I maybe have that much activity in a week. Plus I couldn’t work like that for a junior like you. Not because your a junior, but because I’ve seen no proof of any of your work. What I can see happening is you telling people to code things for you, and then taking most of the credit. I might be wrong, but every development team I’ve joined so far has just died of inactivity. I’m sick to shit of that happening.

Read full topic

item.title: !----soonarus----! Devolution source! recruiting!
item.dc:creator: @Revolutiondodian Revolutiondodian
item.description:
@Revolutiondodian wrote:

                                                           Hello!

Every one that applied i got your name!

Welcome to soonarus, the next Dodian.com

Our home website is Fatalerrors.net which i am working on atm// i didnt not make this name because of Fatalerror source ive had this for 1 yr

What i need 5-10 Good coders,1-5 Advertiser, 1 no-ip hoster, 1 other hamachi hoster 10-15 mods, 2-3 forum mods and 1-5 admins

What I have done ! Nothing at all ! its a plain Devolution v7 source { Ty bakatool true genius }!

Server will be held on a no-ip and 2 Hamachi networks[myne plus another]

If this server gets big enough [Money wise] i will pay you ppl i have around 20 advertisements to get money.

Have a E-mail adress so you can be reached!

If i am offline pm me your application!

                                                            Some updates i want this week!

Specs for weps whip,dds,ddp,dd,dlong,dscimmy,gmaul,dbow,dmace,
Better magic!
Better animations for weps
4 more skills herb farming smithing and rcing
More monsters! [ I will do ]
Forums and website up [ I will do ]
More drops [ I will do ]
Make new ppl non premium!

                                                                             Applications.

l--------------------------l
l Advertisement Application l
l--------------------------l

  1. Will you post on all Rs-private server Communitys/forums?
  2. Post on Hamachi server status page ?
  3. Tell all your friends?
  4. Help Me/Admins get advertisements so we can make money to keep us alive?
  5. Tell all players on Hamachi servers that you join.

l--------------------------l
l Administrator Application l
l--------------------------l

  1. You will play around 10+ hrs on any of the servers whether it be hamachi or no-ip? which is around 1 1/2 hours a day not much
  2. Help coders try to keep all the coders connected ?
  3. Help me on anything i ask.
  4. Help players and make sure rules are enforced?
  5. Handle moderator applications// apllications on anything else?
  6. Handle Premium applications?
  7. Organize meetings when needed?
  8. A lil bit of advertising [=?

l--------------------------l
l Coding Application l
l--------------------------l

  1. Be able to be reached in 1-15hrs of contact?
  2. Be available on week ends 5-10+hrs plus? The whole weekend not ech day
  3. Be on atleast 1-2 hrs a day for any help?

  5. Help your fellow coders?
  6. Be able to get a task given to you in the amount of time given?
  7. Be in contact of E-mail or any other methods?

l--------------------------l
l Forum mod Application l
l--------------------------l

  1. Enforce rules on forums?
  2. be on 10+ hrs a week?
  3. Be happy [= your job is important?

If you want to host the server
1.you must keep 24/7
2. Be reachable so we can send the up to date server file.
3. Dont give the server away!
4. Get your own admins/mods.
